http://img219.imageshack.us/img219/9349/: What does your /etc/fstab file look like?
how do I add sda3 to the fstab?
You have to edit the file, try running this on the terminal: su gedit /etc/fstab
Try adding this line: /dev/sda3 /media/sda3 ext2 defaults 0 2
Then make sure you create the /media/sda3 directory
